title: Master On The Hill
description: The Clubhouse is private. An elite playground. Its members are the power brokers on the Hill in D.C. The Clubhouse or 'House' is owned by seven congressmen...each a commanding Dom with a style all his own. Every night a different Dom rocks the House delivering raw elemental satisfaction. D.C. Dirty Dark Secrets is an erotic series with red-hot dungeon tales of what happens behind closed doors where anything and everything goes.Monday's Master:Ex-hockey player turned congressman, Troy Shepard butts heads with his assistant Alicia Cruz. She's the one woman who defies him incessantly until he turns the tables in a night they'll both remember. He's the House Dom and in the art of submission, he's after every last dirty dark secret Alicia possesses. He'll either spank the truth out of her or...bind her to his bed.
author: Alex Elliott
